title: Delicatessen
writer: Jean-Pierre Jeunet, Marc Caro, Gilles Adrien
actors: Marie-Laure Dougnac, Dominique Pinon, Pascal Benezech
plot: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.
awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award15 wins & 16 nominations total
